name: TESTER (GameOff2021)
description:
The game is about a software tester who tries to clean up bugs from the code. 

The game was made by a lawyer in my spare time, and it's my first game.

The source code on GitHub - https://github.com/GremlinT/GameOff_2021_Bug

All made by me.

Any suggestions and comments are accepted, perhaps I will develop the game further.

I hope you enjoy it.
